REPORT.name: Трафик по интервалам
REPORT.description: Name: Отчет по трафику, показывает объем в МБ по временным интервалам за указанный интервал времени Author: NodaSoft E-mail: support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
CREATE TABLE #tti ( [id] [int] NOT NULL , [min] [int] NOT NULL , [max] [int] NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (15) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
INSERT INTO #tti (id, min, max, name) VALUES (0, 0, 2, N'00:00-01:59') INSERT INTO #tti (id, min, max, name) VALUES (1, 2, 6, N'02:00-05:59') INSERT INTO #tti (id, min, max, name) VALUES (2, 6, 8, N'06:00-07:59') INSERT INTO #tti (id, min, max, name) VALUES (3, 8, 20, N'08:00-19:59') INSERT INTO #tti (id, min, max, name) VALUES (4, 20, 24, N'20:00-23:59')
select #tti.name as [Час суток], CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024/1024 as [numeric] (12,2)) [traffic in MB], CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024 as [numeric] (12,2)) [traffic in KB] from [Sessions] inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id) inner join #tti on ((#tti.[min] <= DATEPART(hour, [started])) and (#tti.[max] > DATEPART(hour, [started]))) where ([started] >= %TIME-START%) and ([started]<=%TIME-STOP%) GROUP BY #tti.name order by [Час суток]
if object_id('tempdb..#tti') is not null DROP TABLE #tti
